results.title: Postprandial lipemia in diabetic men during hypolipemic therapy.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/d) or @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ (267 mg/d) was initiated in all @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ due to fasting @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipemia@@@, and in the @<m>DISEASE_Hypotrichosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007039 @@@AH@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Skoczyńska A, Kreczyńska B, Poreba R. Postprandial lipemia in diabetic men during hypolipemic therapy. Pol Arch Med Wewn. 2009 Jul-Aug;119(7-8):461-8. PMID: 19776686
